name: pg_popyramids
abstract: A PostgreSQL extensions for creating a popyramids database
description: This library contains a set of PostgreSQL extensions, which creates a basic database structure for storing and analyzing population pyramids.

pg_popyramids_ods.abstract: A PostgreSQL extension for creating an Operational Data Store (ODS) schema in a popyramids database.

pg_popyramids_dms.abstract: A PostgreSQL extension for creating a data marts schema in a popyramids database.

pg_popyramids_setup.abstract: Triggers, indexes and other features affecting a full popyramids database.
